article_title: Hunter Health Clinic releases e-mails detailing fall into financial trouble
article_text:
Clinic releases hundreds of e-mails to The Eagle showing the extent of the clinic’s financial problems

E-mails show former CEO Susette Schwartz was fired

New clinic leadership wants a fresh start, in midst of new CEO search

article_metadata.title: Hunter Health Clinic releases e-mails detailing fall into financial trouble | The Wichita Eagle

og.description: The former CEO of Hunter Health Clinic hid $1 million in debt from her board of directors, did not pay vendors and endangered the clinic’s federal contract with the Indian Health Service, according to documents the clinic released to The Eagle as part of a two-year court case.
